articles.title: Decomposing body found in pillar outside grocery store linked to fugitive in California
articles.description: An odor coming from the pillar outside a Lancaster, California supermarket led to a disturbing discovery: a decomposing body linked to a lost suspect.

articles.title: Universal Method to Sort Complex Information Found | Quanta Magazine
articles.description: The nearest neighbor problem asks where a new point fits in to an existing data set. A few researchers set out to prove that there was no universal way to solve it. Instead, they found such a way.

articles.description: A WOMAN was charged with murder and a man was detained for questioning last night over the fatal sword attack on Sydney rapper Scepaz — Jett McKee.
